name: VR Quad Riding Game: Extreme Virtual Reality Games For Google Cardboard
name_original: VR Quad Riding Game: Extreme Virtual Reality Games For Google Cardboard
description:
When using application remain stationary and stop using, when you experience discomfort or health reaction.
Ensure you read this document: http://wenklystudio.com/legal/Warnings/VrHealthWarning.pdf before first use.
-------------------
Extreme Virtual Reality Quad riding experience now available!

You won't regret trying this. This is not a tour - it's real game. The quad will steer along with movement of Your body! No controller needed.

Stunning mountain forest environment that will make You stop to watch the views.
Everyone will find something for them in there. From extreme trials for those who want to feel some adrenaline to easy ones for those that want just relax and admire 360 breathtaking views.


Features:
* Stunning forest mountains environment to explore.
* Optimized for purpose of Virtual Reality


Player on Your favorite VR Headset.
